author: Home Repair Tutor
description: Shower valve tips with PEX A…this is my favorite option when I have a choice. PEX A is super flexible and great for tight spots. Plus this Delta valve has PEX A fittings soldered on at the factory. For more shower valve tips visit homerepairtutor.com 🔥#plumbing #showerremodel #homerepairtutor #diy
title: Shower Valve Tips with PEX A - #shorts #homerepairtutor #diy
